document.full_text: kenyan authorities have seized nearly 1.5 tonnes of elephant tusks hidden in metal boxes at the country's main airport in nairobi, officials said friday.
document.title: kenyan police nab 1.5 tonnes of ivory at airport
lines_and_colors: kenyan authorities have seized nearly 1.5 tonnes of elephant tusks hidden in metal boxes at the country's main airport in nairobi, officials said friday.
